name: AcaciaSmartControl
skdetail:

Developer Terms of Use
des: Now you can use Alexa to control all your Acacia devices! You can open/close your awning simply by giving orders to Alexa. Alexa can show you the stream from supported devices. 1. Download the Fruuion app from the App Store or Google Play Store. 2. Create an account and log in to your Acacia app. 3. Add your device to the Acacia app. 4. Go to the device setting, and click the 'Enable Alexa' button. 5. Open your Alexa app and search skill Acacia, and use the same account to log in. 5. Alexa will discover your device. 6. say, 'Alexa open my shade' to control your Acacia device by Alexa.
